text: The University of New Mexico is a public university in Albuquerque, New Mexico. The university has about 34,674 students. It was founded in 1889. The current president of the university is David J. Schmidly. ==Sports== The athletics teams of the university are called the Lobos. They have 16 varsity teams, most of which compete in the Mountain West Conference (MW). New Mexico has separate conference memberships in two sports that the MW does not sponsor. In skiing, the Lobos are members of the Rocky Mountain Intercollegiate Ski Association. In men's soccer, New Mexico is a member of Conference USA. ==Other websites== *University of New Mexico's Official website *New Mexico Lobos' Official athletics website Category:Mountain West Conference Category:Colleges and universities in New Mexico Category:Albuquerque, New Mexico Category:1889 establishments in the United States
title: University of New Mexico
